dataList.name: Механизированная деятельность миофибрилл
dataList.desc:
Макс. значение: 2.
Наносит на 15% больше урона за Значение
При значении 2 в начале Схваток трансформирует все свои Монеты атакующих навыков в Нерушимые Монеты.
После атаки сбрасывается.

dataList.name: Эскалация дуэли
dataList.desc:
Макс. значение: 20.
«The Thumb Apprentice - Lucio» получает Силу навыка и наносит больше урона за каждую схватку с этим Грешником.
В конце хода сбрасывается, если этот Грешник не вступал в Схватку с «The Thumb Apprentice - Lucio» в этому ходу.

dataList.name: Харон в заложниках
dataList.desc:
-1 к Силе в Схватке при Схватке с «The Thumb Apprentice - Lucio».
Наносит на 20% меньше урона «The Thumb Apprentice - Lucio».

dataList.name: Перерезанное сухожилие
dataList.desc:
Макс. значение: 3.
-1 к Базовой Силе атакующих навыков за каждое значение.
В конца хода уменьшается на 1.

dataList.name: Как нахально!...
dataList.desc:
Макс. значение: 4.
Наносит на 20% больше урона за Значение.
Используется различными навыками.

dataList.name: Стремительный рост
dataList.desc:
Макс. значение: 3.
-1 к Уровню Защиты за Значение (Уровень Защиты от этого эффекта не может быть ниже 1).
Статус сбрасывается, если Руки сломаны.

dataList.name: Кусок плоти
dataList.desc:
Особый Заряд: С фиксированным Значением.
Макс. значение: 2.

dataList.name: Произведение искусства: Фасция
dataList.desc:
В начале хода даёт 4 Увеличения Базовой Силы.
При накладывании Кровотечения атакующими навыками, дополнительно накладывает 2 Кровотечения.

dataList.name: Impact-rattled Armor
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 3
- When using 'Repressed Flesh', lose 10 Final Power for every Stack
- At 3 Stacks after using 'Repressed Flesh', lose this effect and become Staggered until next turn

dataList.name: Железная дева
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Turn Start: Gain 1 Offense Level Down and 1 Defense Level Up
dataList.summary: Turn Start: Gain 1 Offense Level Down and 1 Defense Level Up

dataList.name: Iron Maiden
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Turn Start: Gain 2 Offense Level Down and 2 Defense Level Up
dataList.summary: Turn Start: Gain 2 Offense Level Down and 2 Defense Level Up

dataList.name: Moonlit Azure Blade
dataList.desc:
- Max Stack: 50
- Turn Start: Gain 5 Shield for every Stack
- +1% Damage on Critical Hit for every Stack
- Lose 1 Stack when hit

dataList.name: Зловоние прошлых времён
dataList.desc:
+1 слот навыка.
Наносит на 10% больше урона противникам, имеющим «The House of Spiders».
При Оглушении в начале следующего хода восстанавливается от Оглушения и получает 1 Увеличение силы атаки (Один раз за Бой).
Не может Отступить с поля боя.
dataList.summary: Deal more damage to The House of Spiders enemies

dataList.name: Keen Observation
dataList.desc:
- Cannot be targeted for Charmed
- Deal +25% damage to Fairy

dataList.name: Untroubled Analysis
dataList.desc: - Deal +25% damage to Faelantern

dataList.name: The Thumb Nursefather's Command
dataList.desc: - Lose 5 Offense Levels

dataList.name: Textbook
dataList.desc:
- Clash Power +1 when Clashing against targets with The Duel Escalates
- Clash Lose: Gain 1 Fragile next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Textbook
dataList.desc:
- Clash Power +2 when Clashing against targets with The Duel Escalates
- Clash Lose: Gain 1 Fragile next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Rekindled Exhilaration
dataList.desc:
- Deal +10% damage to The House of Spiders enemies
- When Staggered, immediately recover from Stagger at the start of the next turn and gain 1 Attack Power Up (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Ragged Breath
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Lose 3 Poise Potency

dataList.name: Ragged Breath
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Lose 5 Poise Potency

dataList.name: Mark of the Prescript
dataList.desc: - Apply Mark of the Prescript to a Base Attack Skill on this unit's Dashboard

dataList.name: The Prescript's Target
dataList.desc:
- Take +10% damage from The Index units
- This effect is applied to a single target every turn regardless of the number of The Index units deployed

dataList.name: Grace of the Prescript
dataList.desc:
- Offense Level +1 for every 3 Stacks
- Max Stack: 9

dataList.name: Prescript
dataList.desc: - Receive 'Prescript: [Paper Slip]' under specific conditions
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Paper Slip] I
dataList.desc:
Use a Skill marked with Mark of the Prescript or hit a target with a marked Skill.

- Turn Start: At 0~2 Grace of the Prescript, gain this effect 
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 3
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Paper Slip] II
dataList.desc:
Hit a target with a Skill marked with Mark of the Prescript.

- Turn Start: At 3~5 Grace of the Prescript, gain this effect
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 6
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Paper Slip] III
dataList.desc:
Hit a target with E.G.O Awakening Skill or 'Skill 3' marked with Mark of the Prescript.

- Turn Start: At 6~8 Grace of the Prescript, gain this effect
- Maximum stackable Grace of the Prescript with this Prescript is limited to 9
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Prescript: [Paper Slip] IV
dataList.desc:
Eliminate all enemies before the next Prescript arrives.

- Turn Start: At 9 Grace of the Prescript, gain this effect
dataList.flavor: The Prescripts are delivered by many means, their medium determined with finality akin to divine prophecy. Those who receive them hold no power over how they arrive.

dataList.name: Karmic Consequence
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start:
· Gain 1 Defense Level Down for every 10 Stacks
· Gain 1 Fragile for every 20 Stacks
- Max Stack: 100
dataList.flavor: Receive the Prescript and undertake it. Its execution is etched as karma, drawn into a ceaseless cycle that circles back to the hand of its executor.
